meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unbounded.
meanings.sent1: The unboundednesses of the ocean amazed the young explorers.
meanings.sent2: The unboundednesses of the desert stretched out endlessly before us.
meanings.sent3: The unboundednesses of the buffet left us all in a food coma.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared into unboundednesses like a bird taking flight.
meanings.sent5: The unboundednesses of space made him feel both insignificant and free.

meanings.definition: The condition of lacking boundaries or limits.
meanings.sent1: In the virtual world, unboundednesses of possibilities exist.
meanings.sent2: The unboundednesses of the forest allowed for endless exploration.
meanings.sent3: The unboundednesses of the internet can sometimes be overwhelming.
meanings.sent4: His unboundednesses of creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The unboundednesses of her love for animals knew no limits.
